title: RBI mandates enhanced credit model risk management: New guidelines for lenders
description: The Reserve Bank of India expressed worries about credit risk models' reliability, urging lenders to establish board-approved risk management policies. It planned to supervise these models and issued guidelines to align within six months. The central bank also suggested using external experts for validation and maintaining ongoing reviews of these models.
